bio: Research Topics: Mathematical modelling for complex systems, focusing on coupled systems, processes, and phenomena; predictive modelling in data-driven environments, human intelligence and human errors; application areas are listed here.
Research Topics: Data-driven dynamic models for complex biological systems; coupled fluid-structure interaction problems; physics-informed models machine learning models.
Research Topics: Mathematical modelling of bio-social dynamics in complex systems accounting for psychological factors, brain networks, and nonequilibrium processes.
Research Topics: Mathematical modelling of neurodegenerative diseases and brain networks.

Research Topics: Multiscale modelling coupled complex systems in data-driven environments, focusing on multifunctional smart materials driving eco-friendly technologies; domain dynamics and phase transformations, lead-free piezocomposites.

Research Topics: Modelling of complex systems in data-driven environments; nonlocal models and multiscale analysis in applications to problems in computational neuroscience and brain research; models accounting for an interplay between social and biological factors.
Research Topics: Mathematical modelling of complex materials, coupled processes, and phenomena in nanoscience and nanotechnology applications.
Research Topics: Mathematical modelling for innovative 2D materials, plasmonics and biosensing applications.
Research Topics: Mathematical modelling of coupled climate and hydrologic processes for increased predictive capabilities, data-driven physics-based models.
Research Topics: Mathematical modeling and simulation of nano-electronic devices based on two-dimensional materials.

Research Topics: Multiscale hybrid stochastic-deterministic approaches; social dynamics and networks; statistical mechanics and applications in behavioral and life sciences; human factors and complex systems; cognitive computing.
Research Topics: RNA nanostructures, modelling of soft matter, Molecular Dynamics and atomistic simulations.
Research Topics: Modelling dissipative processes and coupled phenomena with applications in acoustic absorption and energy harvesting.
Research Topics: Modelling and applications of magnetic shape memory alloys, martensitic variant reorientation and phase-fields models.
Research Topics: Biomechanics, control of PDE systems, solid-fluid interactions, biomimetic applications of shape memory alloys and robotics.
Research Topics:Data-driven simulation and machine-learning modelling, optimization and risk,applications for biosocial systems.
